comment: sweet sugar cookie caramel malty, orange/citrus
Extremely smooth and buttery. Slightly sweet caramel notes.
Excellent. Smooth, sweet, perfect scotch. I love this bottle.
Good, a sting of alkohol then some gode notes. The taste doesent last long.

"Light amber color that leaves moderate legs in the glass. Honey, melon, nuts and light smoky nose. Sweet and balanced - fantastic! The bourbon finish is noticeable. This drinks real easy with a medium finish

Still a bit harsh when compared to the 18, but it smells amazing. New bottles need to be opened and allowed to breath a while but the noise on this eventually smells so good it's irresistible. Fruity and vanilla. Just amazing.

Smooth
Apricot, butter, vanilla - some heat. Long finish but not too long

Nose - sweet vanilla caramel
Palate- low peat or oak, medium rich, low to medium spice. No floral no oil. 
Legs thin, low viscosity, light gold colour.
Sweet on the nose with hints of grapes and other fruitiness. A slight note of butter? A light wisp of smokiness and a clean, if spicy finish.

Never had any Macallan before. I was gifted this bottle and very appreciative to receive. Poured neat, nose is deep sweet fruits and buttery malt. Tangerine, dates and hint of white grape surrounded by autumn leaves and gentle oak. Very refined. Palate has rich thick malt and fruits transitioning to wood notes then robust French roast coffee & cream. Has some heat to it but still maintains smooth. Finishes long with malt, fruit and dark chocolate fading dry to coffee and wood. This is not cheap scotch, goes for $90-120. Truly excellent sophisticated single malt but is it worth it? Macallan has a reputation of being a bit overpriced. Depends on your financial situation. I wish I could drink nothing but these high end aged scotches as they are sublime to my palate but alas the credit card bill eventually shows up. For my money in this age range I would take Glenfiddich 15 or Balvenie 14 over this for less $$ however I cant drop it below A rating despite the price as the quality and excellence is undeniable..........94/100
Pale in color. The taste profile belies the color, this is rich and creamy. Floral vanilla and barrel. Beautiful
